settings.issue-message: This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.

settings.comment: Well done on getting your first Pull Request merged by our reviewers. The maintainers are proud of you!We would like to invite you to become a member of our github community team, which will allow you to get more access to our services & access to contributor only perks. Our bot should have already sent the invite. We look forward to you joining the team.

abandoned.name: Status - Abandoned
abandoned.description: This issue / pull request has been abandon

available.name: Status - Available
available.description: This issue is available for either Developers or Community contributors to develop

blocked.name: Status - Blocked
blocked.description: Another issue is blocking the development of this issue

completed.name: Status - Completed
completed.description: Development has finished and been merged for this issue

progress.name: Status - In Progress
progress.description: Development is underway for this issue

hold.name: Status - On Hold
hold.description: The developers have decided to hold the development of this request

pending.name: Status - Pending
pending.description: The developers have approved development of this request.

review.name: Status - Review Needed
review.description: This pull request is waiting on review

revision.name: Status - Revision Needed
revision.description: This pull request has been reviewed and requires revision

doNotDevelop.name: Status - Do not develop
doNotDevelop.description: This wont be worked on by DevOPS or Community contributor

stale.name: Status - Stale
stale.description: This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activite

chore.name: Type - Chore
chore.description: Changes to the build process or auxiliary tools and libraries such as documentation generation

optimisation.name: Type - Optimisation
optimisation.description: A code change that improves performance

refactor.name: Type - Refactor
refactor.description: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature

revert.name: Type - Revert
revert.description: Removes & Discards a previous change as error

deprecated.name: Type - Deprecated
deprecated.description: Marks functionality which is no longer needed

removal.name: Type - Removal
removal.description: Removes previous functionality which is no longer needed

style.name: Type - Style
style.description: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (white-space formatting missing semi-colons etc)

comOpsAccepted.name: ComOps - Accepted
comOpsAccepted.description: A community contributor is planning to work on this issue

comOpsCompleted.name: ComOps - Completed
comOpsCompleted.description: The contributor has completed this issue and handed over to the developers to stage & deploy

comOpsDeveloping.name: ComOps - Developing
comOpsDeveloping.description: The contributor is developing this issue

comOpsTesting.name: ComOps - Testing
comOpsTesting.description: The contributor is awaiting testing results

priorityLow.name: Priority - Low
priorityLow.description: This bug isn't a high priority for the next release

priorityMedium.name: Priority - Medium
priorityMedium.description: This bug affects more than 10% of users and should be patched before the next major release

priorityHigh.name: Priority - High
priorityHigh.description: This bug affects more than 25% of users and should be patched before the next minor release

priorityCritical.name: Priority - Critical
priorityCritical.description: This bug affects more than 50% of users and should be patched before any new features are added

claSigned.name: CLA - Signed
claSigned.description: Contributor License Agreement has been signed

claUnsigned.name: CLA - Unsigned
claUnsigned.description: Contributor License Agreement has not been signed

major.name: Versioning - Major
major.description: Major version to be incremented due to of backwards incompatible changes are introduced

minor.name: Versioning - Minor
minor.description: Minor version to be incremented due to substantial new functionality or improvements are introduced

patch.name: Versioning - Patch
patch.description: Patch version to be incremented due to backwards compatible bug fixes are introduced.

build.name: Versioning - Build
build.description: A build to represent dependencies updates and insignificant changes.

rebase.name: Needs rebase
rebase.description: This request needs to be rebased

wip.name: Work in progress
wip.description: This pull request is a wip

moreInfo.name: More information needed
moreInfo.description: Requires more information before it can continue

firstIssue.name: Good first issue
firstIssue.description: A Good issue for first time github users

firstTimers.name: First Timers
firstTimers.description: A Good issue for first time github users

/^- \[x\] have reproduced on a development build/im
/^- \[x\] have fixed on a clean installation/im
